name: Tap N' Drop: Ball in Basket
name_original: Tap N' Drop: Ball in Basket
description:
This game is simple and easy to learn but difficult to master. There is nothing fancy about this game:). Expect simplicity yet challenging. No ads, no in-app-purchases, and Wi-Fi is not required to play!

[How to Play]
Wait for the ball to be in the right position and simply tap the screen of your device to drop the ball into the basket.

Challenge a family member or friend to see who can get the highest score!

Visit Quest Monkey Games' official web page at www.questmonkeygames.com or the official Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/QuestMonkeyGames/ to get the latest news and info about this game.
